solution_line_template: Initially, Lizzy had ${initial_money}; she loaned out ${loaned_money} so she has ${initial_money}-${loaned_money} = $<<{initial_money}-{loaned_money}={money_left_after_loan}>>{money_left_after_loan} left

Her friend is returning the ${loaned_money} with {interest_rate} interest for a total of ${loaned_money}+(${loaned_money}*({interest_rate})) = $<<{loaned_money}+{loaned_money}*({interest_rate})={returned_money_with_interest}>>{returned_money_with_interest}
